title: Former ESPN Reporter Allison Williams Who Left Over Vaccine Mandate Joins The Daily Wire
sub_head: Williams to host a sports series available to subscribers of conservative news site
body:
Former ESPN reporter Allison Williams, who recently left the network after refusing to follow its Covid-19 vaccine mandate, has joined conservative news site The Daily Wire.
Ms. Williams will host a sports series available for Daily Wire subscribers, according to the media company.
